findings.title: Pragma version not specified
findings.description: Source file does not specify required compiler version

findings.title: Unused function parameter
findings.description: The function declares a parameter that is never used

findings.title: Function could be view
findings.description: Function state mutability can be restricted to view to save gas

findings.title: State variable should be declared as constant
findings.description: State variables that never change their values should be declared constants to save gas

findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas

findings.title: Excessive line length
findings.description: The length of certain lines exceeds the recommended maximum line length
findings.location: Various lines in Bobo.sol and Staking.sol (141, 152, 286, 295, 320, 337, 344, 52, 71, 92, 93, 111)
